text: A Rush of Blood to the Head is the second studio album by Coldplay. It was released on 26 August, 2002. The album includes the singles "In My Place", "The Scientist", "Clocks", and "God Put a Smile Up On Your Face". == Track listing == # "Politik" # "In My Place" # "God Put a Smile upon Your Face" # "The Scientist" # "Clocks" # "Daylight" # "Green Eyes" # "Warning Sign" # "A Whisper" # "A Rush of Blood to the Head" # "Amsterdam" Category:Coldplay albums Category:2002 albums
title: A Rush of Blood to the Head
